name: BoxBoxJumper
description:
A vertical Platformer made for "Spring Jam - Alles neu macht der Mai"

Theme was: "Little Boxes"

You play as a Cat and jump from Box to Box. The Goal is to jump inside a Building to the Top. Boxes that fall leave a smaller Box behind.

Controls:

  •  A/D or LEFT/RIGHT Arrow to move
  • W or UP Arrow to jump
  • W + A/D or UP + LEFT/RIGHT Arrow to climb on Boxes

Software used:

  • Unity
  • Pyxel
  • Audacity

Source Code:

https://github.com/trollfaust/SpringGameJam2022
